name: Flappy Rajinikanth Mumbai
description:
My very first game dedicated to South Indian Star Rajinikanth, the Chuck Norris of India. Search him on youtube, if you don't believe. All arts is self made and HD disco music.

Instructions-

Click to fly the Auto Rikshaw through obstacles.

If the horn gets annoying, bring cursor closer to center and than play, horn will be off near center.

PS: Highest Score I could achieve was 120, Can you do better?

Please donate, if you like,ty.
